ruleFindUrl:
<js>
www="https://m.zongheng.com/h5/category/nav";
css=".cat_list a";
u1="::"; u2="&&";
importClass (org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get (x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+u1+a.attr("href")).join(u2);return list}
result=get(www,css).replace(/\/h5\/.+?\?/g,"/h5/ajax/category/details?pageSize=10&pageNum=searchPage&");
"月票榜::/h5/ajax/rank?pageNum=searchPage&pageSize=10&rankType=1&&男生热门::/h5/ajax/rank?pageNum=searchPage&pageSize=10&rankType=4&&女生热门::/h5/ajax/rank?pageNum=searchPage&pageSize=10&rankType=19&&"+result
</js>

<js>
//注：自定义 d 的值：1是“简单”发现；2是“详细”发现。修改后，刷新发现缓存生效。
d = 1 ;
www="https://wap.faloo.com/category.aspx";
u1="::"; u2="&&";
importClass (org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get (x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+u1+a.attr("href")).join(u2);return list};
switch (d){
case 1: css="div.dh+div.cat_box a[href~=\.html]";
result=get(www,css).replace(/(\/[01]){4}/g,"/0/0").replace(/\/(\d+)\/(\d)/g,"/$1/0/$2/searchPage");break;
case 2: css="div.cat_box+div.cat_box ul.cat_list a";
result=get(www,css).replace(/(?=\.html)/g,"/searchPage");break;}
</js>

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result.replace(/^[^\{]+|\);$|[\r\n]/g,""));
data.results.map(x => {
	let p = x.titleNoFormatting.split(/-|–/);
	return {
		a: p[0],
		b: p[1],
		c: p[2],
		d: "没有最新章节信息",
		e: x.contentNoFormatting,
		f: x.url+'?locale=zh-CN'
	}
});
</js>

ruleFindUrl:
<js>
var a=["所有","玄幻","奇幻","武侠","仙侠","都市","军事","历史","游戏","竞技","科幻","悬疑","灵异","其他","古言","仙侠奇缘","言情","青春","玄幻言情","悬疑灵异","科幻空间","游戏竞技","BL文","GL人文","二次元"];
var b=["更","完"];
var c=["  30","  50"," 100"," 200","200+"];
var d=["更新","点击","推荐","收藏"];
var e=["lastupdate","allvisit","allvote","goodnum"];
var x="";
for (var i=1;i<a.length;i++)
{
for (var j=0;j<b.length;j++)
{
for (var k=1;k<c.length+1;k++)
{
for (var l=1;l<d.length;l++)
{
x= x+d[l]+"["+b[j]+"]:"+a[i]+"/"+c[k-1]+"万"+"::/all/"+i+"_"+e[l]+"_"+k+"_"+j+"_"+l+".html&&";
}
}
}
}
result=x;
String(result);
</js>
